title: UCL final : Anything can happen – Kaka picks winner between Inter Milan vs Man City
body_text:
Sport
UCL final: Anything can happen – Kaka picks winner between Inter Milan vs Man City
Former AC Milan and Real Madrid attacking midfielder, Kaka, has predicted Saturday’s UEFA Champions League final between Manchester City and Inter Milan.
Kaka said that Man City are favourites to beat Inter Milan when both teams meet in the Champions League final in Istanbul, Turkey.
Both Man City and Inter Milan advanced to the Champions League final after eliminating Real Madrid and AC Milan, respectively, in the semi-final stage.
In an interview with Sky Sports Italia, Kaka expressed his enthusiasm for the upcoming Champions League final, insisting that anything can happen.
The Brazilian said, “It’s great to play matches like this, unfortunately there is no Milan but Inter represent Italian football and to see the derby in the semi-final was great.”
“A match in which anything can happen. City are favourites, but we will see a beautiful game.”
